name: A Lone Night
description:
A short point and click adventure game. After coming home from work late and spending some time in your computer,  you fall asleep and wake up with a jolt.

Click on the environment to interact with things, click on items in your inventory at the top to select them, clicking on the environment with an item selected to use it on the environment. Click a blank inventory slot to de-select your current item.

Thank you to those who provided sound on FreeSound.

All people are credited in the distribution.
